ComicInfo.Summary:
The Stainless Steel Rat and Wolfie Smith both come to an end this prog, making way for new stories Meltdown Man, Mean Arena and Strontium Dog in prog 178.
Cover: Carlos Ezquerra (Tharg the Mighty)
The Stainless Steel Rat - Saves the World (part 12 - final part) (Kelvin Gosnell - Carlos Ezquerra - Peter Knight)The Mind of Wolfie Smith (part 15 - final part) (Tom Tully - Mike Dorey - John Aldrich)Judge Dredd - The Judge Child Quest (part 22) (John Wagner - Mick McMahon - Tom Frame)Tharg the Mighty - The Great Human Rip-Off (part 2 - final part) (Tharg the Mighty - Carlos Ezquerra - Tony Jacob)2000AD Galactic Olympics - collectable cut-out booklet (part 4 - final part) (script/art: Steve Maher)
